scripts.build-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node && npm run build-transform
scripts.build-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node --optimize-fcs && npm run build-transform
scripts.build-node: node dist/bundle.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.build-node-es: node out-node/app.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && npm run build-node-transform
scripts.build-native: npm run native bench-compiler.fsproj out-node && npm run build-transform
scripts.build-test-native: npm run native ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-tests-native: npm run native ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests && npm run build-tests-transform
scripts.rollup-bundle: npm run rollup -- -i out-node/app.js -o dist/bundle.js --format esm
scripts.build-lib-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../fable-library/Fable.Library.fsproj out-lib --typed && npm run build-lib-transform
scripts.build-test-node: node out-node/app.js ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test --typed && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-test-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test --typed && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-test-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test --optimize-fcs && npm run build-test-transform
scripts.build-tests-node: node out-node/app.js ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests --typed && npm run build-tests-transform
scripts.build-tests-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests --typed && npm run build-tests-transform
scripts.build-tests-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests --optimize-fcs && npm run build-tests-transform
